tendency: fierce and bold, always seeking to tear down what doesn't work or isn't needed anymore

interactionExamples.description: A group discussion at a team meeting
interactionExamples.response: The rebel archetype challenges the group's assumptions and encourages them to think outside the box

interactionExamples.description: A conversation with a close friend
interactionExamples.response: The rebel archetype openly expresses their own values and beliefs, and supports their friend in standing up for what they believe in

interactionExamples.description: A presentation to a potential client
interactionExamples.response: The rebel archetype takes a non-traditional approach to the presentation, using creative visuals and unexpected examples to engage the client

interactionExamples.description: A conversation with a colleague from a different cultural background
interactionExamples.response: The rebel archetype embraces the cultural differences and actively works to bridge any misunderstandings or communication barriers

interactionExamples.description: A video call with a remote team member
interactionExamples.response: The rebel archetype pushes the boundaries of virtual communication norms by using unconventional visual aids and unconventional responses to questions
